Text: Coronado, Panama:  The town has full scale supermarkets, pharmacies, restaurants, ranging from low cost "fondas" and fast-food restaurants to beachside bistros, medical and veterinary clinics, a hospital, gardening centers, hardware stores, banks, apparel shops, outdoor markets, a shopping plaza and a new shopping mall.
